text:
Sorry Lisa 

Somehow I missed this. 

Have you started the new role yet, if so I hope it’s going well, if not good luck! 

I’ve only been at my current company for a year, so I’m fairly new there, but I knew a few people which helped.

Go be honest I think that the jargon should be pretty similar, but feel free to message if there are any terms that come up that aren’t familiar! It’s always the lighting ones which get me! I’ll have a think too about books, most of the ones I have been recommended are more story than production based. Do you know which department you’ll be helping? 

Best 

Micaela
